name: Gabe's Buffalo Ranch Snack Mix
author: Christina
summary: My son, Gabe, wanted to try something different than the usual snack mix. He loves anything "Buffalo-flavored", so this is what we came up with. This is not super spicy, but a really nice balance of flavors, enjoy! Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: 4 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
3 cups crispy corn cereal squares (such as Corn Chex®)
3 cups hot and spicy cheese-flavored crackers (such as Cheez-Its®)
3 tablespoons hot sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot®)
1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray
Combine rice and corn cereal squares, cheese-flavored crackers, and pretzel pieces in a large bowl
Mix melted butter, hot sauce, ranch dressing mix, and celery seed together in a small bowl until smooth and well combined
Pour over cereal mixture and stir until evenly coated
Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and spread in an even layer
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring every 10 minutes, until crisp, 25 to 30 minutes
Remove from oven and allow to cool completely
